title: Solo Leveling
description: In a world where Hunters with magical abilities battle monstrous creatures emerging from rifts, Sung Jin-Woo is the weakest of the weak, known as the \"World's Weakest Hunter.\" But his life takes a dramatic turn when he's chosen by a mysterious System that grants him the unique ability to level up and grow stronger, embarking on a journey to become the most powerful Hunter and unravel the secrets of the dungeons. This action-packed manga, adapted from a popular web novel, features stunning artwork and a captivating storyline filled with epic battles, powerful abilities, and a thrilling power fantasy.

title: Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint
description: Kim Dokja is the sole reader of a web novel called \"Three Ways to Survive in a Ruined World.\" When the novel suddenly becomes reality, he's the only one who knows how the story will unfold. Using his knowledge of the novel, Dokja teams up with the protagonist, Yoo Joonghyuk, and other characters to navigate the apocalyptic scenarios and fight for survival against powerful constellations and monstrous creatures. This manhwa blends action, fantasy, and drama with a unique metafictional twist, as Dokja leverages his reader's perspective to change the course of the story and challenge fate.

title: Tower of God
description: Tower of God is a manhwa (Korean comic) about a boy named Twenty-Fifth Bam who enters a mysterious Tower to chase after his friend Rachel. This Tower is a dangerous place with tests on each floor, and inhabitants who strive to climb to the top to have their wishes granted. Bam faces challenges, makes allies, and uncovers secrets as he tries to reach the top and find Rachel. It's full of action, fantasy, adventure, and mystery!

title: Hardcore Leveling Warrior
description: Hardcore Leveling Warrior is a manhwa about Ethan Gong, the top-ranked player in the virtual reality game \"Lucid Adventure.\" He's arrogant and ruthless, but his reign is cut short when he's mysteriously de-leveled back to level one. Now, stripped of his power and with enemies everywhere, he must fight his way back to the top while unraveling the secrets behind his downfall. Expect intense action, twists, and a unique take on the gaming genre.

title: Noblesse
description: Noblesse is a manhwa about a powerful vampire noble, Cadis Etrama di Raizel, who awakens after 820 years of slumber. He navigates the modern world while protecting humans from a secret organization and uncovering his past. Expect action-packed battles, supernatural powers, and a touch of drama and sci-fi.

genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Supernatural, Shonen
title: The God of High School
description: The God of High School is a manhwa about Jin Mori, a 17-year-old martial artist who enters a tournament called \"The God of High School.\" This competition brings together high school fighters from across Korea, promising the winner anything they desire.  But as Jin Mori progresses, he discovers the tournament is far more than it seems, with secrets, conspiracies, and powerful gods involved. Expect intense martial arts action, supernatural abilities, and a thrilling storyline.

title: Second Life Ranker
description: Second Life Ranker tells the story of Yeon-woo, a young man whose twin brother mysteriously disappeared years ago. When Yeon-woo discovers a pocket watch left behind by his brother containing a hidden diary, he learns the truth: his brother was betrayed and killed while climbing the Obelisk, a tower filled with dangerous trials and powerful enemies. To avenge his brother and uncover the secrets of the Obelisk, Yeon-woo decides to climb the tower himself, using his brother's knowledge and his own determination to become stronger and face those who wronged him. Expect action-packed battles, a revenge-driven plot, and a unique system of power progression as Yeon-woo fights his way to the top.

title: Eleceed
description: Eleceed is a manhwa about Jiwoo, a kind-hearted teenager with lightning-fast reflexes who secretly protects stray cats.  His life takes a turn when he meets Kayden, a powerful awakener disguised as a fluffy cat, who becomes his mentor. Together, they take on the world of awakeners, facing dangerous enemies and uncovering hidden conspiracies. Expect action-packed battles, heartwarming friendships, and a touch of humor as Jiwoo grows stronger and learns to control his abilities.

title: The Advanced Player of the Tutorial Tower
description: The Advanced Player of the Tutorial Tower is a manhwa about Hyeonu Kim, a man who was trapped inside a mysterious tutorial tower for 12 years.  Forced to fight endless monsters and complete trials, he emerges as an incredibly powerful player. Now free, he seeks revenge on those who imprisoned him while navigating the real world, which has become a dangerous place filled with monsters and dungeons. Expect intense action, overpowered abilities, and a unique blend of game-like elements in a real-world setting.

title: Leveling Up With The Gods
description: Leveling Up With The Gods is a manhwa about Kim Yuwon, a powerful warrior who dies fighting against the Outer Gods.  But he gets a second chance and is sent back in time to just before the world changed and dungeons appeared. Now a \"returnee\" with knowledge of the future, he aims to prevent the catastrophic events he experienced and save his loved ones. He'll face trials, level up with the help of the gods, and fight his way through the ranks to become strong enough to challenge fate. Expect action-packed battles, strategic planning, and a unique time travel element.

title: Villain to Kill
description: Villain to Kill is a manhwa about Cassian Lee, a powerful psychic who fights against villains. Framed for a murder he didn't commit, he's forced to use a mysterious amulet that transfers his consciousness into the body of a student who's on the path to becoming a villain. Now, Cassian must fight to clear his name and stop a dangerous villain while navigating his new identity and the blurred lines between good and evil. Expect action-packed battles, supernatural powers, and moral dilemmas in this thrilling story.

genre: Action, Fantasy, Supernatural, Drama (with a touch of Seinen)
title: Action Fantasy Manhwa: Hero Killer
description: Hero Killer is a manhwa set in a world where the prestigious Hero Clan is shockingly corrupt.  A young woman named Ahjin, fueled by a tragic past and thirst for revenge,  joins a villain organization to fight against the very heroes who are supposed to protect the innocent.  It's a dark action-fantasy with morally gray characters, intense battles, and a unique twist on the classic hero vs. villain trope.

title: Return to Player
description:
In the year 2099, the world is connected by a virtual reality game called "Arcadia." Players can choose to live their lives within the game, their bodies and minds seamlessly transferred to their digital avatars. However, the line between reality and virtuality blurs as players discover that their actions in the game can have real-world consequences.

The story follows Yi Hwi-jae, a former top player who returns to the game after a tragic accident. He quickly realizes that Arcadia is no longer the same safe haven he once knew. The game has become a battleground where powerful players and mysterious entities clash, and the fate of humanity hangs in the balance.

As Yi Hwi-jae navigates the treacherous waters of Arcadia, he must uncover the secrets behind the game's corruption and find a way to save the world from impending doom.

title: Jungle Juice
description: Jungle Juice is a manhwa where humans and insects coexist, but not peacefully.  After a disastrous experiment, insect-human hybrids emerge, and they're far from friendly.  The story follows Suchan Jang, a seemingly ordinary student who gets caught up in this dangerous world when he's bitten by a giant bug.  He soon develops incredible abilities and finds himself thrown into a fight for survival against monstrous creatures and powerful insect-human hybrids. Expect intense action, grotesque transformations, and a unique take on the survival genre.

title: Lore Olympus
description: Lore Olympus is a modern reimagining of the Greek myth of Hades and Persephone, set against the backdrop of a vibrant and dramatic Olympian society. Persephone, a young goddess of spring, catches the eye of Hades, the brooding god of the Underworld.  Their connection is undeniable, but their relationship faces numerous obstacles, including meddling gods, power struggles, and the complexities of their own pasts.  Lore Olympus explores themes of love, loss, trauma, and consent within a captivating and visually stunning world.

title: The Remarried Empress
description: Navier Ellie Trovi was the perfect empress-intelligent, courageous, and beloved by her people. But when her husband brings home a mistress and demands a divorce, Navier takes a shocking step: she remarries the emperor of a neighboring kingdom, retaining her title and defying those who underestimated her.  \"The Remarried Empress\" is a story of betrayal, revenge, and finding love in unexpected places, all set against the backdrop of a richly imagined empire.

title: Leveling Up My Husband to the Max
description: Amber is given a second chance at life after being wrongfully executed.  She finds herself back in time, ten years before her doomed marriage to a cold and uncaring duke.  This time, something's different: her husband seems completely devoted to her.  Armed with the knowledge of her past life, Amber sets out to \"level up\" her husband, improve their relationship, and avoid the tragic fate that awaits them.

title: I’m the Queen in this Life
description: \"I'm the Queen in this Life\" is a manhwa about Ariadne, a woman who was betrayed and murdered by her fiancé and sister just before he was to become king.  She's given a second chance to relive her life, and this time, she vows to take control of her destiny and become the queen.  Expect political intrigue, revenge, romance, and a strong female lead as Ariadne navigates the complexities of court life and fights for her rightful place on the throne.

title: The Witch and the Bull
description: The Witch and the Bull is a manhwa about Tan, a royal advisor who despises witches, and Aro, a kind-hearted witch. When Tan is cursed to become a bull, Aro is the only one who can help him break the spell.  As they work together, they must overcome their prejudices and learn to trust each other, leading to unexpected feelings and a journey of self-discovery. Expect a captivating story with beautiful art, magic, and a slow-burn romance.

title: From A Knight to A Lady
description: Estelle, a valiant knight, dies tragically but is reborn as Lucifela, a noble lady in the enemy kingdom.  Now, she must navigate the complexities of high society while dealing with her past life's memories and a growing attraction to her fiancé, the prince of the kingdom she once fought against.

title: For My Derelict Favorite
description: For My Derelict Favorite is a manhwa about Hestia, a woman who finds herself transported into her favorite novel as a side character.  Determined to save her beloved character from a tragic fate, she uses her knowledge of the story to change the course of events. But as she gets closer to her goal, she finds herself entangled in a complex web of relationships and secrets, and her actions have unintended consequences.

title: Eaternal Nocturnal
description: A young woman named Eve suffers from chronic insomnia. One night, she encounters a mysterious dream eater named Dae who consumes her nightmares, giving her the peaceful sleep she craves. As they continue to meet in the realm of dreams, their connection deepens, but their worlds and the mysteries surrounding Dae's existence threaten to keep them apart.
